text.paragraph: Ayaṃ sikhāpattā vipassanā eva saccānulomañāṇaṃ nāma pavuccati.
Bhavaṅgānantaraṃ saṅkhāru-pekkhāgatanayenāti bhavaṅgānantaraṃ saṅkhārupekkhāsaṅkhātena ñāṇena katanayena.

Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ, uddhañca anulomatoti uddhaṃ vattamānānaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ anulomato, idaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā pariyosānaṃ nāma bhāsitaṃ mahesinā kathitaṃ. Saccānulomañāṇaṃ āhacca uppannā, sabbappakārena gotrabhupariyosānaṃ.
